last_episode_to_air.name: Michael Jackson: The Man In The Mirror
last_episode_to_air.overview: Both adored and condemned, Michael Jackson was surrounded by controversy for most of his life. Never before seen interviews with Michael and Barbara Walters' revealing new interview with Michael's brother Tito and nephew TJ shed light on the icon.

name: Barbara Walters Presents: American Scandals
overview: Iconic newswoman Barbara Walters is front and center of this nine-episode series that revisits headline-dominating true-crime stories, from the murders of JonBenét Ramsey and John Lennon to the trials of O.J. Simpson and the Menendez brothers. Walters recounts some of her most famous one-on-one interviews related to each crime, takes viewers behind the scenes of her original reporting, and reveals new case details. Hourlong episodes also feature Walters' fresh interviews with key players, among them JonBenét's father, John, and former O.J. Simpson houseguest Kato Kaelin.

episodes.name: JonBenét Ramsey: Inside the Mystery
episodes.overview: When six-year-old JonBenét Ramsey turned up dead, her parents are the only suspects. After one of our country's most exhaustive investigations, the Ramsey's are cleared of the crime. 19 years later, Barbara re-interviews her father, John Ramsey.

episodes.name: O.J. Simpson: Kato Speaks
episodes.overview: In one of the most famous murder stories of all time, Nicole Simpson and Ron Goldman were stabbed to death. The evidence pointed to Nicole's ex-husband O.J. Simpson but the jury found him not guilty. 20 years later, Barbara talks with Kato Kaelin again.

episodes.name: Jean Harris: The Headmistress Murderer
episodes.overview: Barbara Walters gets more than she bargained for covering the Jean Harris murder case. Celebrity diet doctor Herman Tarnower is killed and his lover is charged with the crime. Barbara risks her career trying to uncover what really happened.

episodes.name: Menendez Brothers: The Bad Sons
episodes.overview: Why did Erik and Lyle Menendez murder their parents? Barbara shares exclusive details about the case, along with never before seen letters from Erik. And she uncovers a bombshell: a childhood message that could possibly grant the brothers a new trial.

episodes.name: Kimberly Mays: Switched at Birth
episodes.overview: Two baby girls are switched at birth and sent home to the wrong families. One mother suspects foul play, and a high stakes custody battle ensues. Barbara searches for one of the girls, now grown, whose life has taken a completely unexpected turn.

episodes.name: Mark David Chapman: The Man Who Shot John Lennon
episodes.overview: Music legend John Lennon is murdered in cold blood in front of his New York City apartment. Barbara Walters interviews his killer, Mark David Chapman, and reveals new details about the crime in the first ever TV interview with Chapman's wife, Gloria.

episodes.name: Jim Bakker: Fall from Grace
episodes.overview: Jim Bakker finds fame and fortune as a televangelist but a sexual affair and financial scandal cause him to lose everything. Barbara Walters talks to Bakker's family and discovers the surprising truth about what Bakker is up to now.

episodes.name: Mary Kay Letourneau: Forbidden Love
episodes.overview: Barbara Walters revisits the most notorious teacher student sex scandal. Mary Kay Letourneau has an affair with her sixth grade student Vili Fualaau. Barbara has a no holds barred interview with the two about their life together with their two daughters.

episodes.name: Robert Blake: A Hollywood Hit
episodes.overview: Actor Robert Blake discovers his wife Bonnie Bakley murdered. All roads lead to Blake as the killer yet he's found not guilty. Bakley's daughter Holly Gawron tells us why she thinks Robert Blake killed her mother and how she thinks he got away with it.

episodes.name: Gary Hart and Donna Rice The Scandal that Changed History
episodes.overview: In 1987, Gary Hart seemed a sure bet to be the next President until the press accused him of an affair with beautiful Donna Rice. Barbara Walters looks at the political sex scandal that changed history-what she finds will shock you.#NotoriousHeadlines

episodes.name: Leona Helmsley: The Queens Of The Palace
episodes.overview: Real estate billionaire Leona Helmsley gave the parties everyone went to - including Barbara Walters. But when she cheated on her taxes, Rudy Guiliani took her down. Barbara Walters gets the inside story from the famed prosecutor.

episodes.name: Michael Jackson: The Man In The Mirror
episodes.overview: Both adored and condemned, Michael Jackson was surrounded by controversy for most of his life. Never before seen interviews with Michael and Barbara Walters' revealing new interview with Michael's brother Tito and nephew TJ shed light on the icon.
